Introduction
This topic contains general information about respiratory tract infections, including
types of chronic upper respiratory tract infections
identifying the cause of coexisting chronic upper respiratory tract infections
continuous upper respiratory tract infections that first manifest after discharge
, and
relationship between upper and lower respiratory tract infections
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section A - Respiratory Conditions
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section A
